title: pooraNa gnaani
sahitya:
pUraNa jnAni avanE ulaginil puruSOttaman avanE



anupallavi



dhIran manattai venra shUran edarkkum anjAvIran ellArkkum upakAran

nirvikAran



caraNam 1



aduvenru vEdam shol podu naDapporuLinai Aruyikkuyir enrE aribavan

aruLinAl

eduvarinum kavalai illAmal iruppavan EkarasamAi shiva bhOga rasam

pushippavan



caraNam 2



sAtvIka rAjata tAmas guNangaLil shaNDaic-caravellAm sakSiyAi

kANbavan

Atma sakSAtkArattAl anaittuntAn enbavan AzhkkaDal pOlavE amaidiyAi

iruppavan
